ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hi, I am new & stupid :)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... later? ... Sneak can work in front of creatures sometimes. I think. But it works best to buy from merchants who won t sell to you. You can sneak up behind
ygData.messageBody:
> I have a brand spankin' new rogue and I have some questions. I would
> greatly appreciate any feedback.
> 1) How does "sneak" work exactly? Can I sneak across someone's line of
> sight? What is the difference between "Sneak" and "Hide" that comes
later?
>
Sneak can work in front of creatures sometimes. I think. But it works best
to buy from merchants who won't sell to you. You can sneak up behind them
and buy from them. Hide can only be done while holding still.
>
> 2) I do not yet have the "Backstab" ability. Does it do me any good to
> attack monsters from behind without the ability yet? I have been making
an
> effort to do just that, but should I not even bother?
>
I find that my chances of hitting a creature first is improved if I go
behind it. Might not make a diff though. It might just seem like it does.
>
> 3) I noticed that "Disarm Traps" is a later ability, but I cannot recall
> having ever seen or heard of a trap in EQ. Can anyone give an example of
> where and when this ability would come in handy? And how do I know that
> there is a trap around to disarm in the first place?
>
I have no idea about that one. I started a rogue recently and haven't found
any traps to disarm yet.
>
> Sorry for being so naive, but thanks for any help.
>
> "Alazais"
>
It's no problem. :-)
You're welcome.
luv,
-Su
